name: Lipa Community
tagline: JamiiTech For startup and coding biginers
body:
![](http://stackfoward.com/img/logo.gif)### Welcome to Lipa Messanger .
IT Training and Certification - the Boot Camp way!

Not so long ago, the word boot camp was used to describe correctional training camp for military 

recruits. The literal meaning of the word still stands, however with few additions. Now-a-days, 

training has taken a whole new dimension. With geographical boundaries no longer a barrier; 

professionals from all over the world are looking forward to innovative ways of learning through 

offshore training centres. Forget the time when people used to live their whole life within 200 mile 

radius of where they were born. Today’s generation needs exposure. It demands to know. It wants to 

experiment. It’s receptive to knowledge and wishes to learn. It believes in challenging own limitations 

and reaching new heights.

StackFoward.com exists to broaden the minds of those who wish to grow. We strongly believe that the 

businesses can be strengthened only by allowing employees gain expertise over what they love to know. 

Whether we train brilliant individuals or develop a company's mobile strategy, the core philosophy of 

our firm is fundamentally linked with everything we do. Our dedication has guided us at every step in 

following the principles that we apply in our training.

We focus on:

 Learned trainers. Accurate concepts. Approved material. Correct approach. Direct focus.
StackFoward.com trains you on interactive boards. We have qualified trainers who discuss real life case 

studies and give you quality education. We have a set-up aimed to give you best results while you seek 

learning in:various course of our vendors. We take pride in being a Gold certified Microsoft learning 

center and a certified partner of Cisco, Oracle, Novell, Red Hat, EC Council, Apple, EXIN, VMware and 

many more prestigious IT vendors. 

As world's preferred offshore IT Training and Certification company, we let our participants acquire 

knowledge at very economical rates. Being in India, our offshore training modules can be covered only 

within the 50% of the cost prevailing in US and Europe. All the rates are inclusive of:

    • Pick and drop from the airport,
    • Accommodation,
    • Daily meals,
    • Official courseware,
    • Testing fee and of course the training.

we know, today’s India has the world's biggest pool of IT-related services and the second biggest 

workforce committed towards IT sector (US being the first). StackFoward.com has been using this 

gigantic talent pool since beginning of this decade to run its own software training institute offering 

top-notch  at prices you can afford.

Some of our Top IT Boot Camp training programs are:

• Microsoft Training Boot Camp- MCSE 2003 Boot Camp, MCITP Boot Camp, MCTS Boot Camp,    MCPD Boot Camp 

- Click here to go through the entire Microsoft Boot Camp program list
• Cisco Training Boot Camp - CCNA Boot camp, CCNP Boot Camp, CCVP Boot Camp, CCNP    Security Boot 

Camp, CCIE Boot Camp - and many more
• Oracle Training Boot Camp - constitutes of, OCA DBA 11g Boot Camp, OCA DBA 10g Boot    Camp and rest.
• Linux boot camp covers, RHCE Boot Camp, Solaris Boot Camp and many more Click here for the    entire 

list.
